title: Welcome to the Anonymous Knights! ～Rise of the Low-Rare Characters with H power ~ - Novel Updates
author: もっこりーぬ伯爵
description:
When the aristocratic boys reach eighteen, they lead a number of beautiful girls to establish a knighthood, a world similar to a game in which they are obliged to face the threat of the nation.
The eldest son of the ordinary Baron, Ast, also summoned a candidate girl to establish the Knights.
However, he was able to summon only the lowest rare character, who is said to have the lowest qualities ...

While receiving ridicule and contempt from other aristocrats, Ast, who remembers spending time as a Japanese in his previous life, determined to rise up with Low-Rare Characters.>
